feed.title: PeaNUT Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v3.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bump axios from 1.6.7 to 1.7.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/77
  • New Crowdin translations by GitHub Action by @github-actions in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/79
  • armv7 Support by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/80
  • Updated NextJS to 15
  • Updated nodeJS to 22

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v3.0.0...v3.1.0

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v3.1.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixed issue where container would not start if a docker volume was not specified

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v3.1.0...v3.1.1

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v3.1.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Settings fix for existing settings files by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/85

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v3.1.2...v3.1.3

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v3.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • New Crowdin translations by GitHub Action by @github-actions in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/88 and https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/91
  • Optimizations by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/87
  • Performance Improvements
  • Fix a bug where the docs link was hidden on mobile
  • Fix error in logs (Failed to find server action)
  • Fix padding issue on mobile

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v3.1.3...v3.2.0
